TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_M’utu, title = M’utu, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/M’utu} }

S.FORM: m'utu Itiniay i Guanxi Cen no Hsinchu ko m'utu a niyaro', 124 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 339 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 60% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 204 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 40% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 135 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal59%, Amis0.3%, Paiwan0.3%, roma0.3%. Ira ko Kiwkay i niyaro'.

m'oto Itiniay i Goanxi Cen no Hsincho ko m'oto a niyaro', 124 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 339 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 60% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 204 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 40% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 135 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal59%, Amis0.3%, Paiwan0.3%, roma0.3%. Ira ko Kiwkay i niyaro'.
